Overview

Contentjet is an API-first content management system built on a stack of awesome open source projects namely Node.js, Koa.js, Objection.js, PostgreSQL and React. The CMS itself composed of 2 discreet applications, the backend API contentjet-api and the frontend HTML user interface contentjet-ui.

This documentation is very much a work in progress. If you have questions or contributions please open an issue on github.
